text: Thank you for calling the Reserve Bank of India. How can I help you?
We are calling to provide information about the new banking regulations regarding interest rates.
This is [Name] from the RBI. We are following up on your complaint regarding unauthorized transaction.
We have received your complaint about [bank]. We are investigating the matter.
The RBI is conducting a survey about your experience with banking services. Would you like to participate?
This is the RBI calling. Your bank account will be frozen if you don't update your KYC immediately.
We have detected suspicious activity on your bank account. To prevent it from being frozen, you must update your KYC over the phone.
We need to verify your bank account details. Please provide your account number, IFSC code, and OTP over the phone.
Your bank account has been compromised. Please provide your bank account details and OTP over the phone to secure it.
We need to verify your UPI account. Please provide your UPI PIN over the phone.
